duties_responsibilities.duty: Hands-on experience in ETL development for a data warehouse using Informatica, with a focus on maintaining and enhancing mappings, workflows, and processes.
Proficient in programming against large data assets using SQL and integration technologies, with knowledge of Airflow or automated job scheduling tools.
Experience working on an Agile Development team, delivering features incrementally, and demonstrating work to peers and stakeholders for acceptance.
Ability to multitask, adapt, and work collaboratively in a team environment with strong communication, interpersonal, analytical, and problem-solving skills.

Preference for candidates with experience in Python development, cloud platforms (especially AWS), database design, data automation pipelines, and familiarity with program languages such as Java, JavaScript, C/C++, and project tracking software like Azure DevOps and JIRA.
Working knowledge of setting up builds and deployments, and experience with both Windows and Linux.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science/Engineering or a Technology-related field, or equivalent work experience
